clusterList.phrase: that at no time did they represent themselves as anything but investment people

if you look at what they were doing in the 1980s they were investing in public equity private equity activism distressed and doing it all under one roof it was like a modern-day multi-strategy fund well before anyone had even come up with that name
they were really pioneers in the hedge fund format
